metadata.Title: CVE-2017-11185 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The gmp plugin in strongSwan before 5.6.0 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference and daemon crash) via a crafted RSA signature.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-11185` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libstrongswan - 5.1.2-0ubuntu2.7
strongswan - 5.1.2-0ubuntu2.7
strongswan-ike - 5.1.2-0ubuntu2.7
